law.text: The Bluegrass Station Division exists to support, retain, and attract primarily defense and homeland security agencies, contractors, and associated and compatible operations, including the jobs which they bring to Kentucky. Agency contracts, leases, and accounting procedures may additionally reflect the needs of these customers. The Bluegrass Station Division shall be headed by a director experienced with federal contracts, construction, and installation operations, and maintenance funding requirements.
law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 1, effective April 2, 2014.
